sourcesContent:
<label for="filterTask" class="fw-bold">Filtrar</label>
<select name="filterTask" id="filterTask" class="d-block mt-1 mb-3" [(ngModel)]="filter" (click)="filtrar()">
    <option value="all">Mostrar tudo</option>
    <option value="toDO">ToDo</option>
    <option value="doing">Doing</option>
    <option value="done">Done</option>
</select>
